div.p: We have created a single source of information for the students, families, staff and community of Northwest Public schools. Covid 19 announcements and information is shared on this site along with on-line learning activities. NWPS staff is working diligently to … Read More

a.title: Permanent Link to PowerSchool Parent Accounts
Permanent Link to PowerSchool Parent Accounts

div.p: Parents/Guardians of students at Northwest Public Schools have the ability to check on their students grades, attendance, assignments, daily bulletin, student fees, and receive documents through the PowerSchool Parent Portal at their convenience. If you need assistance, please refer to … Read More

a.title: Permanent Link to Pre-Participation Physicals for 2020/21
Permanent Link to Pre-Participation Physicals for 2020/21

div.p: Health care providers in the state are experiencing changing demands to deal with COVID-19. These changes are causing them to postpone most, if not all, non-essential wellness and maintenance visits. Most of them are planning changes to last until July.

a.title: Permanent Link to April Board Meeting

div.p: The April Board meeting will take place via Zoom. The public may observe via the Zoom app, which is a free download for either a Windows or Mac computer. Topic: NWPS Board Meeting Time: April 13, 2020 07:00 PM Central … Read More

h2.a: Northwest Public Schools Registration Process for 2020-2021.

div.p: Do you have question about the registration process at Northwest Public Schools for the 2020-2021 school year? On this page, you will find instructions for returning and new students procedures, along with frequently asked questions with the registration process.
